inlineContent.text: provides tools for creation, manipulation, and display of various graphs. Its main purpose in the engine is to power the visual programming systems, such as visual shaders, but it is also available for use in user projects.
by itself is only an empty container, representing an infinite grid where
represents a node in the graph, a single unit of data in the connected scheme.

, but no action is taken by default. It is the responsibility of the programmer utilizing this control to implement the necessary logic to determine how each request should be handled.
